poem:
"Alchemy in a Capsule"

Alchemy thrives not in cryptic scrolls,
But in packets of silver foil.
From diabetes to matters of weight,
Semaglutide redefines our fate.
Ozempic reborn as Wegovy, a new role,
A promising cure to the obese soul.
Medicine's revolution spins a hopeful tale,
More than just numbers on the weighing scale.

Write a poem in YOUR OWN DISTINCTIVE STYLE, no more than 60 words long. You may add a one line title at the top if you like.
